titles.title: A resolution providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for expenses of investigations and studies by the Committee on Education and Labor in the first session of the One Hundredth Congress.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 2/3/1987--Introduced. Authorizes expenditures by the House Committee on Education and Labor for the first session of the 100th Congress, including the procurement of consultant services and assistance for specialized training for its professional staff.
